name: MediaTrackSettings.latency
description: The MediaTrackSettings dictionary's latency property is a double-precision floating-point number indicating the estimated latency (specified in seconds) of the MediaStreamTrack as currently configured. This lets you determine what value was selected to comply with your specified constraints for this property's value as described in the MediaTrackConstraints.latency property you provided when calling either getUserMedia() or MediaStreamTrack.applyConstraints().

refs.name: Media Capture and Streams
refs.description: The definition of 'latency' in the 'Media Capture and Streams' specification.
